title: Man Medium Dark Skin Tone White Hair
description: A man with medium-dark skin tone and white hair. It represents an older man with specific hair color and skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a distinguished gentleman with a medium-dark skin tone and striking white hair, conveying a sense of wisdom and experience. The hair is rendered with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges and subtle gradients, appearing almost touchable.  Its gentle smile and neutral gaze suggest a calm and thoughtful demeanor, often used to represent an elder, a mentor, or someone possessing valuable knowledge.
